review_title: DO NOT WORK HERE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE A FOREIGN WORKER
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Itta Bena, MS
pros:
A few decent students (5% of the population) actually want to study
The ground's crew comprising of staff and detainees from the Mississippi Department of Corrections are doing a great job of maintain the grounds
The post office is pretty much organized
cons:
Everything is wrong
The laziest HR department in the world
HR would not respond to emails
HR would not file employment paper work on time with the USCIS thereby threatening or putting you out of status
Supplies take nothing less than 3 months to arrive
Majority of the students do not understand what it means to be in college
Widespread examination malpractice
Dilapidated equipment
Red tape with the simplest things - everything here is done with a boatload of paper work
Witnessed a lot of dishonesty from people in positions of authority
Extremely poor staffing for some department leading to where professors do the work meant for laboratory assistants such as washing dishes and making media
Extremely disorganized,  poor inventory management resulting in cases where innocent people are blamed for missing items that they had nothing to do with
I have never seen it this bad in America! I strongly do not recommend working here under any circumstance - it is a pure waste of your time and energy.
